title: First Indian on ISS
description: Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla has made history as the first Indian to board the International Space Station (ISS)

title: Old Phones Linked to Thai Pollution
description: Thailand officials inspect electronic waste to trace pollution linked to old phones and devices dumped at industrial sites

title: Sensex, Nifty Rally on Iran-Israel Truce
description: Markets surged as Sensex gained 1,859 points and Nifty 577 amid easing tensions, lower oil prices, and rupee strength.

title: Webb Telescope Finds Unknown Alien Planet
description: For the first time, NASA's Webb telescope discovered a new exoplanet—a young gas giant about 110 light-years away.

title: Aspirations of 1.4 billion’: India celebrates as first International Space Station mission gets underway
description: The new version improves performance and adds exciting features.
